name: .IMI File Extension
summary: Learn about .IMI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Map file used by Magellan GPS navigation systems, including eXplorist and Triton devices; contains a map, including streets, topography, and points of interest; used to access map information while driving, hiking, camping, hunting, fishing, or boating.

content: IMI files are also used to visualize waypoints, routes, and geocaches within Magellan PC software programs.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
